page.title: 02Primary school life
page.content: In a typical week,we do things like Maths, English, French and P.E. On Mondays, Thursdays and Fridays we have{ASSEMBLIES}. This is an activity which involves us in singing and our Headmaster tells us stories. Then the points for each team are announced and the winning{HOUSE CAPTAINS}hold up the points cup with a coloured ribbon on it. The Houses are{HADDON}- yellow; { {HARDWICK}- blue;{PEVERIL}- green and {CHATSWORTH}- red. After school there are many{clubs} which we can join. For example MONDAY is Craft Club, WEDNESDAY is Netball, Football, THURSDAY is table tennis. On top of these we have netball and football matches during the season. A busy time can be had by everyone.
